title: help!
content:
I search the font in this logo for the word 'ring'...  
Someone?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725050330im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_5035.jpg)
author: Idiosyn

comments.content: It looks like an **[ITC Stone Sans II](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725050330/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/stone-sans-ii/)**, the Extra Bold Italic weight or the Extra Bold artificially slanted (to achieve the extra width on /n's top)
